question: During this Ramadan I slept till it was sun rise and I didn't have my suhoor, but I continuded to fast, is my fasting valid?
answer:
QUESTION

During this Ramadan I slept till it was sun rise and I didn't have my suhoor, but I continuded to fast, is my fasting valid?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

Yes, your fasting is valid.

(Bahisti Zewar, Pg.321, Zam Zam)

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
